articles.title: Trump fires labor statistics chief after disappointing job numbers
articles.description: President Trump has fired the head of the Bureau of Labor Statistics following a worse-than-expected jobs report. The move comes as the economy shows signs of weakening, with job gains dwindling and inflation rising.

articles.title: Ghislaine Maxwell moved to Texas prison camp
articles.description: Ghislaine Maxwell, convicted of sex trafficking, has been moved from a Florida facility to a minimum-security women-only prison camp in Texas. The move has drawn criticism from victims' families who view it as preferential treatment.

articles.title: 51 Palestinians Seeking Aid Massacred at Zikim Crossing in Gaza
articles.description: Officials in Gaza report that Israeli forces killed at least 51 Palestinians who were seeking aid at the Zikim crossing. The incident is part of a broader pattern of violence where hundreds have been killed and injured while trying to access humanitarian assistance.
